original_text: And it came to pass, as she came unto him, that she moved him to ask of her father a field: and she lighted off her ass; and Caleb said unto her, What wouldest thou?
korean_text: 악사가 출가할 때에 그에게 청하여 자기 아버지에게 밭을 구하자 하고 나귀에서 내리매 갈렙이 그에게 묻되 네가 무엇을 원하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: that she moved him to ask of her father a field
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그에게 아버지에게 밭을 청하도록 권하였고

sentences.original_text: and she lighted off her ass
